# [Interview #1088: WoR Signing Report - Argent, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1088#11)

#### Question

Has Hoid been on Roshar before
*The Way of Kings*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
